description: Manage Azure Active Directory only Authentication settings for this Server.

commands.name: az sql server ad-only-auth disable
commands.summary: Disable Azure Active Directory only Authentication for this Server.
examples: az sql server ad-only-auth disable --resource-group mygroup --name myServer

commands.name: az sql server ad-only-auth enable
commands.summary: Enable Azure Active Directory only Authentication for this Server.
examples: az sql server ad-only-auth enable --resource-group mygroup --name myServer

commands.name: az sql server ad-only-auth get
commands.summary: Get a specific Azure Active Directory only Authentication property.
examples: az sql server ad-only-auth get --resource-group mygroup --name myServer
